maqras.text: 75|1|Ami sapatha karachi kiyamatera dinera [1]
75|2|ami ara'o sapatha karachi bhartsanakari atmara [1].
75|3|Manusa ki mane kare ye, amara kakhano'i tara asthisamuha ekatra karate paraba na
75|4|abasya'i hyam, amara tara angulera aga paryanta punarbin'yasta karate saksama [1].
75|5|Baram manusa tara bhabisyate'o papacara karate caya [1].
75|6|Se prasna kare, ‘kakhana kiyamatera dina asabe?’
75|7|Yakhana cokha sthira haye yabe [1]
75|8|ebam camda haye parabe kiranahina [1]
75|9|ara yakhana surya o camdake ekatra kara habe [1] –
75|10|sedina manusa balabe, ‘aja palanora sthana kothaya?’
75|11|Kakhano'i naya, kono asrayasthala ne'i.
75|12|Sedina thami habe apanara rabera'i kache.
75|13|Sedina manusake abahita kara habe se ki age pathiyeche o ki pichane rekhe geche [1].
75|14|Baram manusa nijera samparke samyaka abagata [1]
75|15|Yadi'o se nana ajuhatera abatarana kare.
75|16|Taratari ohi ayatta karara jan'ya apani ta niye apanara jihbake druta sancalana karabena na.
75|17|Niscaya era sanraksana o patha karanora dayitba amadera'i.
75|18|Kaje'i yakhana amara ta patha kari apani se pathera anusarana karuna
75|19|tarapara tara barnanara dayitba niscitabhabe amadera'i [1].
75|20|Kakhano na, baram tomara duniyara jibanake bhalabasa
75|21|ara tomara akheratake upeksa kara [1].
75|22|Sedina kono kono mukhamandala ujjbala habe
75|23|tara tadera rabera dike takiye thakabe [1].
75|24|Ara kono kono mukhamandala haye parabe bibarna
75|25|asanka karabe ye, eka dhbansakari biparyaya tadera upara apatita habe.
75|26|Abasya'i [1], yakhana praana kanthagata habe
75|27|ebam bala habe, ‘ke take raksa karabe?’
75|28|Takhana tara pratyaya habe ye, eta bidayaksana.
75|29|Ara payera gochara sange payera gocha jariye yabe [1].
75|30|Sedina apanara rabera kache'i sakalake hamkiye neya habe.
75|31|Sutaram se bisbasa kare ni ebam salata'o adaya kare ni.
75|32|Baram se mithyaropa karechila ebam mukha phiriye niyechila.
75|33|Tarapara se tara paribara parijanera kache cale giyechila ahankara kare
75|34|durbhoga tomara jan'ya, durbhoga
75|35|abara durbhoga tomara jan'ya, durbhoga [1]
75|36|manusa ki mane kare ye, take emani chere deya habe [1]
75|37|se ki biryera sthalita sukrabindu chila na
75|38|tarapara se ‘alaka’ya parinata haya. Atahpara allah take srsti karena ebam suthama karena.
75|39|Atahpara tini ta theke srsti karena yugala--- nara o nari.
75|40|Tabu'o ki se srasta mrtake punarjibita karate saksama nana [1]
76|1|kalaprabahe manusera upara ki emana eka samaya ase ni [1] yakhana se ullekhayogya kichu'i chila na [2]
76|2|amara to manusake srsti karechi milita sukrabindu theke [1], amara take pariksa karaba [2]; ta'i amara take karechi srabana o drstisakti sampanna [3].
76|3|Niscaya amara take patha nirdesa diyechi, haya se krtajna habe, na haya se akrtajna habe [1].
76|4|Niscaya amara kapheradera jan'ya prastuta rekhechi sekala, galara beri o lelihana aguna [1].
76|5|Niscaya satkarmasilera [1] pana karabe emana purnapatra-paniya theke yara misrana habe kaphura [2]
76|6|emana ekati prasrabana ya theke allahara bandagana [1] pana karabe, tara e prasrabanake yatheccha prabahita karabe [2].
76|7|Tara manata purna kare [1] ebam se dinera bhaye kare, ye dinera akalyana habe byapaka.
76|8|Ara tara mahabbata thaka sapekse [1] abhabagrasta, iyatima o bandike [2] khabara dana kare [3]
76|9|ebam bale, ‘sudhu allahara sastusti labhera uddesye amara tomaderake khabara dana kari, amara tomadera kacha theke pratidana ca'i na, krtajnata'o naya [1].
76|10|‘Niscaya amara asanka kari amadera rabera kacha theke eka bhitiprada bhayankara dinera.’
76|11|Pariname allah taderake raksa karabena se dinera anista hate ebam taderake pradana karabena hasyojjbalata o utphullata [1].
76|12|Ara tadera sabarera [1] puraskarasbarupa tini taderake pradana karabena udyana o resami bastra.
76|13|Sekhane tara helana diye asina thakabe susajjita asane, tara sekhane khuba garama athaba khuba sita dekhabe na [1].
76|14|Ara tadera upara sannihita thakabe gachera chaya ebam tara phalamulera thokasamuha sampurnarupe tadera ayattadhina kara habe.
76|15|Ara tadera upara ghure ghure paribesana kara habe raupyapatrae [1] ebam sphatika-saccha panapatre
76|16|rupara sphatika patrae [1], tara ta parimana karabe sampurna-parimitabhabe [2].
76|17|Ara sekhane taderake pana karano habe yanajabila misraita purnapatra-paniya [1]
76|18|jannatera emana eka prasrabanera, yara nama habe salasabila [1].
